message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for this product.  Let me know what you think.
I understand that $9,500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can sell it to you for $11,000.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $11,000, but I'm still not quite there. How about $10,000? That's a fair price for both of us.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $11,000, but I'm willing to make a compromise. I can sell it to you for $10,500. It's a fair price, considering the value the product brings to you.
